thread.title: Hidden gem in New York City
thread.title_full: Hidden gem in New York City - Review of 3 West Club, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: marycaycorr
title: Hidden gem in New York City
text:
To find this small hotel just go to St. Patrick's Cathedral and cross Fifth Avenue. The building is under Historic Preservation but the rooms have good beds and all the requirements of a small hotel. One must visit the beautiful living rooms, the ballroom and paneled library. A meal in the restaurant is a MUST. The service and food are excellent as are the drinks available from the bar. There is a deli nearby for the cost conscious.
Room Tip: Rooms are limited so it is best to reserve early. See more room tips
